Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    GameMap procedurally generates a map that is 1.5 times bigger than the actual screen. It contains walls, corners, floors, obsticles , inside walls, and hallways.

      GameMap constuctor that creates map from a file.
      GameMap(int level)
      This is the game map and where the map gets generated, along with where the player starts, the zombies start, where the exit is.

        Parameters:
        tile_size - how large we want the tiles to be
        Returns:
        an image of the map

      • generateMap

        public static void generateMap()
        this is where the magic happens and the map is made. There are many different things that happen in this method in order to make a map from char types, then transform them into ENums to print later on
